name: Oatey PVC/CPVC Purple Primer - 8 oz.
description: The Oatey 8 oz. PCV and CPVC Purple Primer, made from a mixture of solvents, is designed to remove surface dirt, oils and other contaminants from the surface of PCV or CPVC piping. Not recommended for use on ABS piping installations. Meets ASTM F-656 specifications.Purple-tinted aggressive primer for use on PVC and CPVC pipe and fittingsLo-V.O.C. primer meets California South Coast Air Quality Management District (SCAQMD) 1168/316A or BAAQMD method 40 and various environmental requirementsRemoves surface dirt, grease and grime as well as softens the pipe surface to allow a fast, secure solvent weldFor use in areas where plumbing code calls for verification that a primer has been usedNSF listedMeets ASTM F-656
